name: Pumpkin "Cookie Dough" Bites
description: These cookie dough-inspired protein bites can help you fit breakfast into your busy morning. Theyâ€™re quick, easy, delicious, and nutritious!
preparation: To food processor, add chickpeas, maple syrup, nut butter, rolled oats, and mix. Blend on high until smooth, about 4 min, scraping down the sides of the food processor as necessary.
Transfer to a bowl and stir in chocolate chips.
Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner. Using Prep Pro Scoop (2 tbsp), scoop dough into balls and place on pan. Refrigerate 45 min. After refrigerating, roll balls to smooth edges.
Store in refrigerator in an airtight container.
tips: For an even healthier alternative, substitute raw pumpkin seeds for chocolate chips.
